name: signs_symptoms_final_illness
label::English: General signs and symptoms associated with final illness
label::Bahasa: Gejala dan Tanda-tanda yang ditemukan pada periode terakhir sakitnya Almarhum/Ah

name: id3B100
label::English: Did (s)he have a fever?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami demam?

name: id3B110
label::English: How many days did the fever last?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) almarhum/ah mengalami demam?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”. Use 1 week = 7 days to determine the number of weeks
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 Hari = "0". Gunakan 1 minggu = 7 Hari untuk menentukan jumlah minggu

name: id3B115
label::English: How severe was the fever?
label::Bahasa: Seberapa berat demam yang diderita almarhum/ah?

name: id3B120
label::English: Did (s)he have night sweats?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami berkeringat di malam hari?

name: id3B130
label::English: Did (s)he have a cough?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami batuk-batuk?

name: id3B140
label::English: For how many days did (s)he have a cough?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (Hari) almarhum/ah mengalami batuk-batuk?

name: id3B150
label::English: Was the cough productive, with sputum?
label::Bahasa: Apakah batuknya berdahak (produktif)?

name: id3B155
label::English: Was the cough very severe?
label::Bahasa: Apakah batuknya parah?

name: id3B160
label::English: Did (s)he cough up blood?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ketika batuk keluar darah (batuk berdarah)?

name: id3B170
label::English: Did (s)he make a whooping sound when coughing?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah ketika batuk mengeluarkan suara merejan?

name: id3B180
label::English: Did (s)he have any breathing problem?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami masalah pernapasan?
hint::English: Explain to the respondent that even if the answer is "no" some more questions will be asked, just to make sure no important detail has been missed.

name: id3B190
label::English: During the illness that led to death, did (s)he have fast breathing?
label::Bahasa: Apakah menjelang kematiannya almarhum/ah mengalami bernafas dengan cepat?

name: id3B200
label::English: For how many days did the fast breathing last?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) almarhum/ah mengalami bernafas dengan cepat?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 Hari = "0"

name: id3B210
label::English: Did (s)he have breathlessness?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami sesak nafas?

name: id3B220
label::English: For how many weeks did (s)he have breathlessness?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (minggu) almarhum/ah mengalami sesak nafas?

name: id3B230
label::English: Was (s)he unable to carry out daily routines due to breathlessness?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah pernah tidak dapat melakukan aktivitas rutin sehari-hari disebabkan mengalami sesak nafas?

name: id3B240
label::English: Was (s)he breathless while lying flat?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah sesak nafas jika dalam keadaan berbaring pada posisi datar?

name: id3B242
label::English: During the illness that led to death, did (s)he have difficulty breathing?
label::Bahasa: Apakah menjelang kematian almarhum/ah mengalami sulit bernafas?

name: id3B244
label::English: For how many days did the difficulty breathing last?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) almarhum/ah mengalami sulit bernafas?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 Hari = "0"

name: id3B246
label::English: Was the difficulty continuous or on and off?
label::Bahasa: Apakah kesulitan bernafas terjadi secara terus menerus atau datang dan pergi?

name: id3B250
label::English: Did you see the lower chest wall/ribs being pulled in as the child breathed?
label::Bahasa: Apakah otot dinding dada bagian bawah anak (almarhum/ah) tertarik kedalam saat bernafas?
hint::English: Show photos.
hint::Bahasa: Tunjukkan Gambar

name: id3B260
label::English: During the illness that led to death did his/her breathing sound like any of the following:
label::Bahasa: Apakah menjelang kematian almarhum/ah mengeluarkan suara nafas seperti : ngorok, merintih, mengi
hint::English: Demonstrate each sound, in doubt select multiple
hint::Bahasa: Tirukan masing-masing suara

name: id3B270
label::English: Did (s)he have severe chest pain?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami nyeri dada yang berat?

name: id3B272
label::English: How many days before death did (s)he have severe chest pain?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) almarhum/ah mengalami nyeri dada yang berat?

name: id3B274
label::English: How many minutes did the pain last?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (Menit) nyeri dada berlangsung?

name: id3B280
label::English: Did (s)he have diarrhoea?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami diare?

hint::Bahasa: Dibutuhkan pemahaman responden tentang diare. Jika tidak jelas atau salah, jelaskan kepada responden arti sebenarnya dari diare yaitu Buang air besar cair lebih sering dari biasanya.

name: id3B290
label::English: For how many days did (s)he have diarrhoea?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (Hari) almarhum/ah mengalami diare?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”. Use 1 week = 7 days to determine the number of weeks
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 Hari = "0". Gunakan 1 minggu = 7 Hari untuk menentukan jumlah minggu

name: id3B292

hint::English: Enter “999“ if this information is not known.
hint::Bahasa: Enter “999“ if this information is not known.

name: id3B294
label::English: How many days before death did the frequent loose or liquid stools start?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) sebelum meninggal, almarhum/ah mulai Buang air besar sering atau cair?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”.  Enter “999“ if this information is not known.
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 hari = "0". Enter “999“ if this information is not known.

name: id3B296

name: id3B300

label::Bahasa: Apakah ada darah dalam tinja?

name: id3B305

label::Bahasa: Apakah ada darah dalam tinja hingga almarhum/ah meninggal?

name: id3B310
label::English: Did (s)he vomit?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami muntah?

name: id3B315
label::English: For how many days before death did (s)he vomit?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama(hari) almarhum/ah mengalami muntah?
hint::English: Less than 1 day= “0”
hint::Bahasa: Kurang dari 1 hari = "0"

name: id3B320
label::English: Did (s)he vomit blood?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah muntah berwarna merah segar (seperti darah)?

name: id3B325
label::English: Was the vomit black?
label::Bahasa: Apakah muntahnya berwarna kehitaman?

name: id3B330
label::English: Did (s)he have any abdominal problem?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami nyeri perut?
hint::English: Explain to the respondent that even if the answer is "no" some more questions will be asked, just to make sure no important detail has been missed.

name: id3B340
label::English: Did (s)he have severe abdominal pain?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mengalami nyeri perut yang berat?

name: id3B350
label::English: For how many days before death did (s)he have severe abdominal pain?
label::Bahasa: Berapa lama (hari) almarhum/ah mengalami nyeri perut yang berat?

name: id3C200

name: id3C215

label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhumah meninggal selama atau setelah melahirkan bayi kembar?

label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah masih sakit saat keluar rumah sakit?

name: id3H100
label::English: Has (s)he received immunization?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah mendapatkan imunisasi?

name: id3H110
label::English: Do you have the child's vaccination card?
label::Bahasa: Apakah anda memiliki kartu vaksinasi almarhum/ah?

name: id3H120
label::English: Can I see the vaccination card (note the vaccines the child received)?
label::Bahasa: Bolehkah saya melihat kartu vaksinasi tersebut dan mencatat jenis vaksinasi yang telah didapat oleh anak (almarhum/ah)?
hint::English: Only fill in the vaccination sheet if the respondent has the vaccination card at the present moment during the VA interview; the interviewer should fill in the vaccination sheet, not the respondent.
hint::Bahasa: Hanya diisi dikertas vaksinasi jika responden membawanya saat wawancara. Pewawancara harus mengisi dikertas vaksinasi bukan responden.

name: id3H125
label::English: Note vaccines here

name: id3H130
label::English: Was care sought outside the home while (s)he had this illness?
label::Bahasa: Apakah mencari perawatan dari luar rumah saat almarhum/ah sakit?

name: id3H140
label::English: Where or from whom did you seek care?
label::Bahasa: Dimana atau dari siapa anda mencari perawatan tersebut?

name: id3H150
label::English: Record the name and address of any hospital, health center or clinic where care was sought
label::Bahasa: Catat nama dan alamat dari rumah sakit, puskesmas atau klinik saat menerima perawatan tersebut

name: id3H160
label::English: Did a health care worker tell you the cause of death?
label::Bahasa: Apakah petugas kesehatan mengatakan penyebab kematian almarhum/ah?

name: id3H170
label::English: What did the health care worker say?
label::Bahasa: Apakah yang dikatakan oleh petugas kesehatan tersebut?

name: id3H180
label::English: Do you have any health records that belonged to the deceased?
label::Bahasa: Apakah anda mempunya catatan kesehatan milik almarhum/ah?

name: id3H190
label::English: Can I see the health records?
label::Bahasa: Bolehkah saya melihat catatan kesehatan tersebut?

name: id3H200
label::English: Record the date of the most recent (last) visit
label::Bahasa: Catat tanggal pada kunjungan terbaru

name: id3H210
label::English: Record the date of the last but one (second last) visit
label::Bahasa: Catat tanggal pada dua kunjungan terbaru

name: id3H220
label::English: Record the date of the last note on the health records
label::Bahasa: Catat tanggal saat membuat catatan terakhir

name: id3H230
label::English: Record the weight (in kilogrammes) written at the most recent (last) visit
label::Bahasa: Catat berat badan (dalam kilogram) yang ditulis pada kunjungan terbaru
hint::English: (enter e.g. 3.5)

name: id3H240
label::English: Record the weight (in kilogrammes) written at the last but one (second last) visit
label::Bahasa: Catat berat badan (dalam kilogram) yang ditulis pada dua kunjungan terbaru

name: id3H250
label::English: Transcribe the last note on the health records
label::Bahasa: Menuliskan catatan terakhir pada catatan kesehatan

name: id3H330
label::English: Has the deceased’s (biological) mother ever been tested for HIV?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ibu almarhum/ah pernah diperiksa test HIV?

name: id3H340
label::English: Was the HIV test ever positive?
label::Bahasa: Apakah hasilnya positif?

name: id3H350
label::English: Has the deceased’s (biological) mother ever been told she had HIV/AIDS by a health worker?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ibu almarhum pernah dikatakan menderita HIV/AIDS oleh petugas kesehatan?

name: group4
label::English: Background and context
label::Bahasa: Latar Belakang dan Konteks

name: id4A100
label::English: In the final days before death, did s/he travel to a hospital or health facility?
label::Bahasa: Dihari terakhir menjelang kematiannya, apakah almarhum/ah datang ke rumah sakit atau Fasilitas kesehatan?

name: id4A110
label::English: Did (s)he use motorised transport to get to the hospital or health facility?
label::Bahasa: Apakah almarhum/ah menggunakan transportasi roda dua atau empat menuju ke rumah sakit atau fisilitas kesehatan?

name: id4A120
label::English: Were there any problems during admission to the hospital or health facility?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ada masalah saat pendaftaran di rumah sakit atau fasilitas kesehatan?

name: id4A130
label::English: Were there any problems with the way (s)he was treated (medical treatment, procedures, interpersonal attitudes, respect, dignity) in the hospital or health facility?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ada masalah saat almarhum/ah dirawat (Perawatan medis, prosedur, sikap interpersonal, rasa hormat, martabat) didalam rumah sakit atau fasilitas kesehatan?

name: id4A140
label::English: Were there any problems getting medications, or diagnostic tests in the hospital or health facility?
label::Bahasa: Apakah ada masalah saat mendapatkan pengobatan atau saat dilakukan pemeriksaan di rumah sakit atau fasilitas kesehatan?

name: id4A150
label::English: Does it take more than 2 hours to get to the nearest hospital or health facility from the deceased's household?
label::Bahasa: Apakah membutuhkan waktu lebih dari 2 jam untuk membawa almarhum/ah menuju rumah sakit atau fasilitas kesehatan terdekat?

name: id4A160
label::English: In the final days before death, were there any doubts about whether medical care was needed?
label::Bahasa: Dihari terakhir menjelang kematiannya, adakah keraguan tentang pengobatan yang diperlukan?

name: id4A170
label::English: In the final days before death, was traditional medicine used?
label::Bahasa: Dihari terakhir menjelang kematiannya, apakah almarhum/ah mendapatkan pengobatan tradisional?

name: id4A180
label::English: In the final days before death, did anyone use a telephone or cell phone to call for help?
label::Bahasa: Dihari terakhir menjelang kematiannya, adakah seseorang yang menelpon untuk memanggil bantuan?

name: id4A190
label::English: Over the course of illness, did the total costs of care and treatment prohibit other household payments?
label::Bahasa: Selama menjalani pengobatan penyakit, apakah total pembiayaan pengobatan tersebut menyebabkan gangguan pada pembiayaan rumah tangga?

label::Bahasa: Tambahan Penjelasan Terbuka (Cerita)

name: id6H260
label::English: Was a death certificate issued?
label::Bahasa: Dimana akte kematian tersebut dikeluarkan?

name: id6H270
label::English: Can I see the death certificate?
label::Bahasa: Bolehkah saya melihat akte kematian tersebut?
hint::English: Fill in the following questions only if you are shown the copy of the certificate.  Do not fill in just based on oral statements.
hint::Bahasa: Fill in the following questions only if you are shown the copy of the certificate.  Do not fill in just based on oral statements.

name: id6H280
label::English: Record the immediate cause of death from the certificate (line 1a)
label::Bahasa: Catat penyebab langsung kematian dari akte kematian (baris 1a)
hint::English: An antecedent cause is the one that caused the one on the line above, e.g. diabetes mellitus may be an antecedent cause to kidney disease.
hint::Bahasa: Penyebab awal adalah penyebab yang bisa menyebabkan sakit pada baris diatasnya. Contoh: Diabetes melitus bisa menjadi penyebab awal untuk penyakit ginjal.

label::Bahasa: Catat penyebab pertama kematian dari akte kematian (baris 1b)
hint::English: For all following lines, add duration, if stated.
hint::Bahasa: For all following lines, add duration, if stated.

name: id6H290a
label::English: Duration (Ib):
label::Bahasa: Duration:
